en_GB.best_browser: The game performs best in Mozilla Firefox.
en_GB.help_selected_baby: The circle 'Halo' around a fish, means this is your controlled fish.
en_GB.help_selected_adult: After 15 seconds all fish turn into adults. The fishes immunities are layed out around the fish.
en_GB.help_click: You can control your fish by clicking on a location.
en_GB.help_controls: This is how you can tell your fish what decision to make.
en_GB.help_stats: You can see your current statistics here.
en_GB.help_male_fish: Male fish look like this. You can out cross with one by clicking 'out cross' in the controls and bumping into them.
en_GB.help_infected_fish: Fish will get infected if you go to close to pathogens you are not immune to.
en_GB.objective_text: The aim of the game is to grow your fish population to the largest size it can, in the allotted time provided.
en_GB.movement_text: To move you fish, simply click on the destination you want the fish to go to.
en_GB.breeding_text: To breed either click (in the right menu) 'self' or click 'out cross' and find a male.
en_GB.where_parents_text: Once an adult gives birth the parent disappears. This does not affect your fish population, don't worry.
en_GB.running_slow_text: Try adjusting the graphics setting in the right menu to boost performance.
en_GB.population_down: Why does my population number go down?
en_GB.population_down_text: Randomly the game removes fish from your population, due to natural causes.
en_GB.not_supported: Your browser does not support HTML5 Canvas.
en_GB.have_outcrossed: You have out crossed! This will boost your immunities and help your future generations fight off infections.
en_GB.have_infected: You have been infected. To avoid infection, out cross with males to pick up their immunities. Make sure you reproduce before you die.
en_GB.need_name: You need to enter a name
